param.name: pileup
param.label: Select DNA polymorphism file(format : samtools pileup)

param.name: consensus
param.label: Consensus quality threshold in pileup file (default: 0)

param.name: snp
param.label: SNP quality threshold in pileup file (default: 20)

param.name: map
param.label: Maximum mapping quality threshold in pileup file (default: 0)

param.name: coverage
param.label: read coverage threshold in pileup file (default: 8)

param.name: het_hom_both
param.label: Select hets, homs or both (default: both)

param.name: mpileup
param.label: Select DNA polymorphism file(format : samtools mpileup)

param.name: dp
param.label: (DP) Raw read depth threshold in mpileup file (default: 0)

param.name: mq
param.label: (MQ) Root-mean-square mapping quality threshold in mpileup file (default: 0)

param.name: het_hom_both
param.label: (GT) Select hets, homs or both (default: both)

param.name: gq
param.label: (GQ) Genotype quality threshold in mpileup file (default: 0)
